implementation.useCase: Asana integrated Claude into their proprietary Work Graph data model to power Asana AI, enhancing their work management platform with AI capabilities for task automation, insights generation, and workflow optimization.
implementation.problem: Teams struggle with coordination of work, answering questions like who is doing what by when, and why. Asana sought to revolutionize work management through generative AI to address these challenges.
implementation.integrationMethod: Integration with Asana's proprietary Work Graph data model through collaboration in Anthropic's Early Access Programs

metrics.metric: global customers using Asana's platform powered by Claude
metrics.sourceText: Asana, a leading enterprise work management platform, powers their Asana AI offering with Claude for its 150,000+ global customers.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: AI features have improved how teams understand and achieve goals
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Asana has achieved remarkable results for users by integrating Claude. AI features have increased goal clarity and productivity, and have helped reduce decision-making time for executives.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Executives can make decisions faster with AI-powered insights
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Asana has achieved remarkable results for users by integrating Claude. AI features have increased goal clarity and productivity, and have helped reduce decision-making time for executives.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Ability to build features in weeks that would have taken years
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Asana's partnership with Anthropic has accelerated their AI capabilities. Pelz shares, "What's cool about AI now is doing things we thought would require years of engineering effort, in just a few weeks with a small team; it's catalyzed how fast we can build features to help our customers."

qualitativeBenefits.detail: A global media company improved C-Suite escalations and work handoffs
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: One global media and entertainment company turned to Asana to streamline their workflows for roadmapping and planning projects. Thanks to Asana they've improved C-Suite escalations, smoothed work handoffs, and automated request routing to the right projects and processes.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: An outdoor advertising company transformed their creative request process
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Another customer, a leading outdoor advertising company, is exploring AI to transform their creative request process. With Asana AI they are able to triage requests, deliver tailored recommendations on ad designs, and streamline their ad creation process.

technicalDetails.architecture: Claude is integrated into Asana's proprietary Work Graph data model, which captures work-related relationships, context, and information across an organization, providing structure for AI to access context needed for insights.
technicalDetails.solutions: Integration of AI features directly into Asana's interface to ensure seamless user experience without disrupting workflows
